addonAfter.description: The label text displayed after (on the right side of) the input field.
addonAfter.description_zh: 带标签的 input，设置后置标签

addonBefore.description: The label text displayed before (on the left side of) the input field.
addonBefore.description_zh: 带标签的 input，设置前置标签

disabled.description_zh: 是否禁用状态，默认为 false

prefix.description: The prefix icon for the Input.

size.description: The size of the input box. Note: in the context of a form, the `large` size is used. Available: `large` `default` `small`
size.description_zh: 控件大小。注：标准表单内的输入框大小限制为 `large`。可选 `large` `default` `small`

suffix.description: The suffix icon for the Input.

type.description: The type of input, see: MDN(use Input.TextArea instead of type="textarea")
type.description_zh: 声明 input 类型，同原生 input 标签的 type 属性，见：MDN(请直接使用 Input.TextArea 代替 type="textarea")。

allowClear.description: allow to remove input content with clear icon
allowClear.description_zh: 可以点击清除图标删除内容

events.name: change
events.description_zh: 输入框内容变化时的回调

events.name: pressEnter
events.description: The callback function that is triggered when Enter key is pressed.
